cc_fips_test(1) General Commands Manual cc_fips_test(1)

NAME

cc_fips_test —
Validates correctness of the corecrypto library during bootup

DESCRIPTION

The cc_fips_test performs a basic POST validation pass on the corecrypto dynamic library loaded by the operating system during the early boot cycle. This command is called by launchd and will return a non-zero error code if the system fails the tests.
02/02/12 Darwin
